mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no, STATUS, rent_time, revert_time, renter_no, renter_phone, total_amt, pay_flag, deposit_amt, deposit_pay_flag, real_revert_time, settle, is_dispatching, dispatching_renter_status, prepAuth_result, pay_time, operator_event, operate_time, owner_no, owner_phone, depositAuth_result, deposit_pay_time, city, car_no, rent_amt, renter_order_no, source FROM trans WHERE order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE trans SET real_revert_time = #{real_revert_time} WHERE order_no = #{order_no}

UPDATE trans SET status = #{status}, pay_flag = #{pay_flag}, dispatching_renter_status = #{dispatching_renter_status}, prepAuth_result = #{prepAuth_result}, pay_time = #{pay_time}, operator_event = #{operator_event}, operate_time = #{operate_time} WHERE order_no = #{order_no}

UPDATE trans SET status = #{status}, deposit_pay_flag = #{deposit_pay_flag}, dispatching_renter_status = #{dispatching_renter_status}, operator_event = #{operator_event}, depositAuth_result = #{depositAuth_result}, deposit_pay_time = #{deposit_pay_time} WHERE order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.rent_time 'rent_time', a.revert_time 'revert_time', b.day_price 'day_price', b.holiday_price 'holiday_price' FROM trans a LEFT JOIN car b ON a.car_no=b.reg_no WHERE a.order_no=#{order_no}
SELECT id, STATUS, rent_time, revert_time, day_unit_price, holiday_price, rent_amt FROM trans_log WHERE order_no=#{order_no}
SELECT id, STATUS, rent_time, revert_time, day_unit_price, holiday_price, rent_amt, operate_time, update_time FROM trans_log WHERE order_no = #{order_no} ORDER BY operate_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, car_no, rent_time, revert_time, day_unit_price, weekend_price, holiday_price, holiday_average, rent_amt, is_original, confirm_flag, operator_time, create_time FROM trans_modification_application WHERE order_no = #{order_no} AND confirm_flag = '1'

SELECT id, car_no, rent_time, revert_time, day_unit_price, weekend_price, holiday_price, holiday_average, rent_amt, operator_time, create_time FROM trans_modification_console WHERE order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE trans SET rent_time=#{rent_time},revert_time=#{revert_time} WHERE order_no IN ('484366812171','448867912171','879980912171')
UPDATE cpic_hrocloud_application SET termtime=#{termtime},returntime=#{returntime} WHERE orderno IN ('208646220171','408646220171')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trans t,car c WHERE c.reg_no=t.car_no AND c.city='310100' AND (t.srv_get_flag=1 AND (t.rent_time>#{startTime} AND #{endTime}>t.rent_time) OR (t.srv_return_flag=1 AND t.revert_time>#{startTime} AND #{endTime}>t.revert_time)) AND (t.status>1 AND 13>t.status OR t.status=21)
